A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie exceeded my expectations and I believe plays well with the originals trilogy. I have been a huge Star Wars fan since watching A New Hope when I was 8 years old at a friends house and begged my parents to buy my all 3 movies on VHS. Fans who hate the new movies need to view it differently. I get that the movies and books that they hold dear has changed but the story arc has gone in a direction to give us all a new hope. I hope JJ will do episode 9 in a way that gives us all something to look forward to in episodes 10\, 11 and 12. I do hope that there is redemption for Ben Solo as there was for Vader but I don’t think he should be allowed to live given his past discrepancies. Perhaps with Rey\, she will somehow be able to carry the Skywalker line to the next chapters\, which seems to be the way they are going at this rate. I just hope it’s done in a way that is reminiscent of couples past in the Star Wars universe. Until 2019...
